# discoverabilityTitle

**Instance Property**

A long, informative title to use in the keyboard shortcut overlay.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var discoverabilityTitle: String? { get set }
```

## Managing the appearance

- **title**: A short display title for the menu element.
- **image**: An image that appears next to the menu element.
- **attributes**: The attributes that determine the style of the menu element.
- **presentationSourceItem**: The item you can use as an anchor for subsequent presentations.
